supportContent.en: Match the idioms (draggable items) to the sentences where they best replace the underlined phrases.

questionText.en: Replace the underlined phrases by dragging the correct idiom to the sentence:

label.en: 1. I don’t want to ruin my friendship with him for ______.
2. He thinks ______ if he admitted the mistake.
4. I wanted to ______ with my colleagues by explaining why I’ve been late.
5. He invited her to the party, but ______.

feedbackCorrect.en: Excellent! You matched all the idioms correctly.
feedbackCorrect.ar: ممتاز! تم مطابقة جميع المصطلحات بشكل صحيح.

feedbackIncorrect.ar: الإجابة غير صحيحة. راجع معاني المصطلحات: 'to break bread with' (يبني صداقة/ثقة)، 'to lose face' (يفقد الاحترام/السمعة)، 'to have a wide face' (محبوب/ذو شعبية)، 'to save face' (يتجنب الإحراج/الحفاظ على ماء الوجه)، 'to give someone pumpkins' (يرفض شخصًا).
